message: I use Braintree in my Rails app (www.snackandmunch.com)  it's the easiest API ever!  Does anyone else have good luck with something else?
I am leaning more towards recurly.com .

Braintree has served us well at bugrocket. We considered (and even tried out) Chargify, but in the end adding another link in the chain felt too risky (their very-little-notice 2 hour downtime seems to have reaffirmed our fears! http://chargify.com/blog/database-downtime-coming-tonight/).
+1 on recurly at the moment, though I skipped over braintree in the list of things I looked at. No reason, just recurly and chargify seemed easy peasy. Braintree a lot cheaper?
